titleStmt.title: The Christian doctrine: or, A short catechism Briefly shewing how to become a Christian: how to continue a Christian. Divided into ten heads, for the ease of memory. Approved by sundry elders of the baptized churches.
titleStmt.author: J. S.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Francis Smith, at the Elephant and Castle in Cornhil, near the Royal-Exchange,

notesStmt.note: Identifed as Wing S36 on UMI microfilm "Early English books, 1641-1700.".
